title: Reality Recoded
description: A fascination with numbers and belief in positive thinking gives a former athlete and game designer the ability to change his reality.There’s only one small problem. He’s not the first to discover this. A secret cabal already controls reality, and they don’t take kindly to those messing with the code.REALITY RECODED is the latest technothriller from Dave Buschi. For fans of thrillers and science fiction.
author: Dave Buschi
